title: Budget-Friendly Meal Planning
text: Plan with low, medium, or high budget tiers. NutriBridge adjusts recipes to your financial goals without compromising on health.

title: Personalized Guidance
text: Weekly plans tailored to your diet, lifestyle, and preferences—great for students, busy parents, and seniors alike.

title: Health-Focused Programs
text: Choose Heart Health, Diabetes-Friendly, Weight Management, or Wellbeing. Follow simple weekly actions with light progress tracking.

title: Smart Ingredient Swaps
text: Get practical alternatives based on what’s seasonal, local, or in your pantry—keeping meals sustainable and accessible.

title: Clear Nutrition Insights
text: Every recipe shows calories and key nutrients at a glance, so you can make informed choices quickly.

title: Save & Access Anytime
text: Your preferences and meal plans are stored locally on your device—no sign-in required.
